title: Popping Balloon
description: In this game your task is to pop the balloons before they disappear from the screen. With every balloon that does not popped and the balloon escapes, will be taken away from your playing time. There are also balloons with x on them. You should not popped them as they will take away your playing time. Try to popped as many balloons as you can while playing this game. But the balloons move from left to right and it is not easy to shoot them. Some of them are hard to reach.
instructions: Tap on balloons to play this game.

title: Fisherman Sliding Puzzles
description: Fisherman Sliding Puzzles is an engaging sliding jigsaw puzzle game. Your task is to move pieces of images to recreate the picture displayed on the right side of the screen. With 8 exciting and challenging levels, test your puzzle-solving skills and piece together each scene!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Reflection Symmetry
description: Use Reflection Symmetry to fill area and complete a level. Challege your brain. Swipe / Draw a symmetry line / Fill area Different levels to complete.
instructions: Swipe with your finger. Draw a symmetry line. Fill level

title: Among Them Space Puzzle
description: In this Among Them Space Puzzle game you have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Kittens Jigsaw
description: Dear girls! We are glad to offer you a collection of puzzles with cute kittens by 4GameGround.ru. These lovely babies will give you warmth and love! Choose the difficulty level and have fun with the benefits! Collect them all!
instructions: Use mouse or tap the screen

title: Rotate
description: In this game you can choose to play with a circle, triangle, square or hexagon. They all have spikes on the inside and a small ball that you must control to avoid colliding with the spikes. Choose a shape you want to play with and rotate left or right to avoid spikes but also to collect diamonds and other achievements that will appear, such as ball protection, extra life and more.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: New York Jigsaw
description: We invite you to enjoy a bird's-eye view of New York City in the jigsaw puzzle game by 4GameGround.com! These will be amazing pictures, but you will have to collect them first. Move the fragments with images to the desired place and form a picture.
instructions: Use mouse or tap screen

title: Fishing Tactics
description: Fishing Tactics is a challenging block collapse game that presents a unique challenge in each level. Your goal is to complete the challenge within a set number of turns. The fewer turns you use, the more bonus points you'll earn. Can you conquer all 20 levels and emerge as the ultimate fishing tactician?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Numblocks Hunter
description: NumBlocks Hunter is an exciting Arcade-Action Math game where your mission is to keep the blocks away from the base by eliminating rows of blocks. You can remove one row at a time by tapping a block in the frontline that displays the answer to a math question presented on the base block. How long can you defend the base with your math skills?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Sand Truck
description: Sand Truck Is a logical game with trucks. In this game you have to control a sand factory. Sand of different colors is found in the tanks of the factory. The sand is loaded only in a truck that has the same color as the sand. That is why the sand has to go through different pipes to reach the truck. You will control the pins with which you will direct the sand to reach the right truck. Sometimes you will store the sand in warehouses if there is no suitable truck for that sand. This game has 30 levels. They are very interesting and fun, but you have to play with logic to pass all the levels. If you fail to pass a level first, you can just restart that level and continue playing.
instructions: Tap on the pins to play this game.

title: Toy Shop Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Complete the Toy Shop puzzle game by building the jigsaw puzzle. This Jigsaw Puzzle game has Levels to complete one by one. Drag and drop the puzzle parts in to correct position to build the images. Enjoy!
instructions: Drag and drop the puzzle parts in to correct position to build.

title: Jumbled Puzzle
description: Put the jumbled up pieces together as quickly as possible to complete levels. Swap the blocks to reveal the jumbled up puzzle. With 100’s of exciting levels and ton of themes to uncover, you will never be bored with this game. As you progress levels, unlock the mystery boxes, bonus levels and many more cool surprises. Multiple ways to solve each puzzle can you find the best solution and within time limit?
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: Flat Jumper
description: After the ball is released, players need to decide after the cross piece of color, speed changes the color of the ball, make the color of the ball is consistent with the color of the horizontal piece, Otherwise ball will fall off. Adhere to the longer the score will be higher! Heave Fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Meet cute animals, visit unknown places, or get to see new things. Experience all of this while playing comfortably on your phone. Choose the difficulty that suits your own pace and finish every jigsaw puzzle.
instructions: Tap buttons for corresponding actions. Win by moving pieces on the board and combining them together into a picture. Unlock new sets of puzzles by completing the sets that are already unlocked. Explore all game modes and finish every puzzle to complete the game.

title: Falling Ball
description: Falling Ball is challenging platform game. Aim of the game is to throw colored balls from a height and include a point through different platforms. Jump one platform to another and prevent the ball from falling. If your ball fall to many times out of the target the game is over. Have fun.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Pong Ball
description: Pong Ball is very simple kids game. This is a game in which you need to score as many points as you can by moving colored balls - dropping ball must hit the ball with the same color. Have fun.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Jumping Box
description: In this puzzle jumping game the block must get to the red flag so that you can move to the next level. At the same time, you can move the square by shooting balls. They will hit the walls and push the block wherever you want. It won't be easy at first, but when you adjust the principle of movement fun begin.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Figures
description: Figures – is a puzzle game in which you need to put the right shape in the hole until the thorns have destroyed you. But you get every time different scheme of figures to fill and less time to complete the task. Have fun.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Hexa Cars
description: Hexa Cars game is a fun io survival game. The goal is to stay last on different maps without falling down! Each different map requires a different skill. You can play Hexa Cars game for 1 player or 2 players. You can unlock new cars with the coins you collect. Have Fun!
instructions: If playing single: Move: "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "SPACE" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Jump: "Q" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "SPACE"

title: Water Sort Puzzle 2
description: The second in the Water Sort Puzzle series! This time the difficulty is increased and there are more styles. More grades. It's more difficult. There are 300 levels. You can challenge yourself, or you can ask for help! Have a good time.
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Grid Blocks Puzzle
description: Grid Blocks Puzzle is a game in which you must drag the pieces in the grid to fill rows or columns to score. You’ll always have three pieces to play, although you can’t rotate them, you can rotate the grid or invert him (horizontally or vertically), further, activating the Drag Mode, you can able to drag and drop the blocks even those already fixed to the grid. You won’t lose if you run out of space to fit the pieces, your only limitation it will the time (yellow bar). If you want relax, you can also active the Zen mode (No time, but no scoring).
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Easter Pic Slider
description: "Easter Pic Slider" is a delightful puzzle game that brings the Easter spirit to your device. Your task is to rearrange the pieces of Easter images by moving them between tiles, arranging them in ascending order. Tap or click a block to shift it to an adjacent blank space. Be mindful of the ticking clock; you'll lose points with each passing second. So, strategize wisely to complete the puzzle and maximize your score. Get ready for a challenging and festive Easter experience!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Easter Bunny Puzzle
description: Play with 9 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Easter Bunny Puzzle. All images is with the easter bunny. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 easter bunny games.

title: Happy Easter Puzzle
description: Play with 9 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Happy Easter Puzzle. All images is with the happy easter. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 jigsaw puzzle games.

title: Easter Bunny Slide
description: Play this slide puzzle games of the Easter Bunny. It's include 3 images and 3 modes (3x3 pieces, 4x4 pieces, 5x5 pieces) to play.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 games.

title: Spot The Differences
description: Do you have the eagle eyes? Can you spot the differences between 2 images in a short time? These are 20 challenges for you to try. Enjoy the game now!
instructions: Tap on the differences

title: Farm Hero
description: A disaster has struck the farm! The flood has scattered all the animals. They're scared and barely floating above the water. Use your wits to connect the animals into the given shapes so they can be rescued.
instructions: The aim of the game is to save flooded animals that are scattered throughout the farm by connecting them into given shapes. Drag and move the animal in the desired direction. Repeat until all animals are connected.

title: Adam and Eve Go 2
description: In Adam and Eve GO, despite the dangers and the challenges of the prehistoric times, love found a way to blossom! Adam loves Eve and he'll do anything to make her happy. Join this adventurous caveman through the multiple fun and challenging levels of this game! Can you help him overcome the obstacles and bring a nice flower to his significant other? Dinosaurs, traps, and many other dangers are waiting for you in this addictive game! Your objective is to complete each level by collecting a rose and bringing it to Eve. The game features 15 different levels for you to complete. Start from the first level. Use the arrow keys to move around and climb up and down the ladders. Be careful though! You'll encounter many different traps and obstacles. You need a way to bypass them. Either standing on pressure plates or using other objects would clear your way. You'll see fruits laying around in each level. Try to collect as many of them as possible, as these give you extra points. Approach other characters and give them what they want to gain items or even keys! Keys are required to open doors so you can reach Eve after collecting the rose. Enjoy!
instructions: You can use the arrow keys to control Adam. Use the left and right arrow keys to move around, and the up and down arrow keys to climb up and down the ladders.

title: WarTanks Jigsaw
description: Especially for fans of battle tanks we has prepared an excellent portion of puzzles. Choose your deadly car and coьздуеу the picture piece by piece. Enjoy!
instructions: Use mouse or tap to screen.

title: Colors Game
description: Colors Game With the game Colors Game you learn the different colors in a fun way on your phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids Colors Game With the game Colors Game you learn the different colors in a fun way on your phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the correct color.

title: Crossword Puzzles AWS-PROD
description: Cross word puzzles. Guess the answers for the given clues and fill the puzzle board with your answers. When all board filled, your puzzle will be complete, so then you can ask for a new puzzle!
instructions: Select vertical or horizontal clues from the clue list one by one. When you click a clue on the clues list, on the puzzle board you will see the cells showing the answer for this clue marked with a different color. Click on the cells and fill your answer for the clue. If your answer is correct the region will be marked as green. If you can find all the answers for the puzzle, the board will be filled with green cells every where, this will mean you completed the puzzle correctly.

title: Spot the Difference Animals
description: In the game Spot the Difference - Animals you will find a full search for differences on ten fascinating levels with animals. Do not click unnecessarily, if you click wrong three times the game will end. The difference found will be marked with a circle so that you do not return to it. The game will make you focus and become more attentive, the differences are small, barely discernible, you have to sweat to find them.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Búlica
description: Test your reflexes and skills in this fun game, can you be the best? Use your finger to cut the rope and drop the ball, put all the balls in the barrel (Búlica) to pass the level, release the wooden pegs to open the way and facilitate your goal!
instructions: Slide the screen to cut the strings and release the wooden pegs to open paths.

title: Airplane Puzzles
description: Airplane puzzle is a fun online puzzle game. Drag the pieces into right position using mouse. Solving puzzles is relaxing, rewarding, and keeps your brain sharp. You need to spend $1000 to be able to purchase one of the following pictures. You have three modes for each picture from which the hardest mode brings more money. You have a total of 10 pictures.
instructions: Beautiful car graphics and 10 pictures with 3 levels.

title: Circle Collector
description: Circle Collector is a cool game where you mission is to collect colored balls by pressing one of the 3 colored balls at the bottom on the screen. The faster you play, the better. However, there’s a gray circle that floats over the collection units, and if some of the colored ball touch that as you play, it’s game over. Have fun.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Spring Illustration Puzzle
description: Play with 9 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Spring Illustration Puzzle. All images is with the spring illustration. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 jigsaw puzzle games.

title: Jelly Cubes
description: "Jelly Cubes" is a delightful puzzle game where you pick and drop sets of jelly cubes onto the board. Click to rotate block sets. Match three cubes of the same color to score and remove jellies. No time constraints, just manage your board space wisely. Create larger groups for higher scores. Enjoy the sweet challenges!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Among Space Jigsaw
description: In this Among Space Jigsaw game you have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Stacky Dash
description: Stacky Dash is an arcade relaxing game. To gather ample bricks and arrive at the final platform, you need to control the character. I strongly recommend that you collect all the bricks to get more diamonds and overpass all the platforms on each platform with even repeated routes.
instructions: Drag to play.

title: Farm Heroes Match
description: A fun and addicting match-3 game. Match the same tiles to collect the powers for the corresponding hero, to fire at the harmful insects. Play as fast as possible before the countdown timer runs out, to win a high score. PLAY NOW!
instructions: Tap and drag to match the tiles.

title: Caveman Jigsaw
description: "Caveman Jigsaw" is a fantastic puzzle game with an ancient caveman theme. Challenge yourself in two modes: Easy mode with 24 pieces and Hard mode with 48 pieces. Your objective is to drag and drop the picture pieces to their exact locations and complete the picture before time runs out. Can you piece together the past in this exciting game?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Ring Of Love 3D
description: 1. The unique ring parkour is full of fun. 2. More strange obstacles will continue to block you, all kinds of difficult dangerous challenges are more challenging 3. The game picture is fresh and simple, let people get relaxed in the game
instructions: 1. The ring of love controls the ring to reach the end of the game, challenging all the way in the thrilling track 2. Click left and right to control the ring, flexible change direction, easy to dodge all kinds of obstacles

title: Puzzle Game Boys
description: Puzzle Game Boys is a great game to help children improve their abilities and speed in solving problems. There are 9 (nine) beautiful puzzles for kids to play with. Have fun with this amazing puzzle for kids!
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Flowers Blocks Collapse
description: "Flower Blocks Collapse" offers endless block-collapse fun with challenging gameplay and exciting power-ups. Collapse groups of at least 2 connected similar blocks, either horizontally or vertically, for higher scores. Keep those columns from reaching the top to master this game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Sudoku Village
description: How good are your sudoku skills? In Sudoku, a 9x9 grid is given with any amount of numbers already filled in. To solve the puzzle, fill in the empty square with any number from 1- 9. The puzzle is complete when each row, each column and each 3x3 square within the puzzle contains the numbers 1-9, with each number appearing only once.
instructions: A classic sudoku game

title: Space Heroes Match
description: A fun and addicting match-3 game. Match the same tiles to collect the powers for the corresponding hero, to fire at the enemy spaceships. Play as fast as possible before the countdown timer runs out, to win a high score. Features: - colorful tiles - nice animations and effects PLAY NOW!
instructions: Tap and drag to match the tiles.

title: Missing Num Bubbles 2
description: It is interesting number game for kids. In this game there are 3 modes; what number comes before asked number, what number comes after asked number, and what number comes between 2 given numbers. See the left panel to see given number and select right number bubble from the right box.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Catch The Apple
description: In the physics-based puzzle game, Catch The Apple, it is your task to guide an adventurous little hedgehog through a variety of tricky levels. The goal of each level is help the hedgehog collect all of the apples. In addition to these delicious apples, it is also important to collect as many stars as you can to unlock new levels and maximize your score. In each level, your perception will be put to the test. You have a variety of useful items and equipment such as balloons, fans, tubes, destructible crates and some friendly animals. Be sure to use these items strategically to reach all of the apples and stars.
instructions: The hedgehog in this puzzle game is hungry and needs your help to catch the apple. Use the mouse to play.

title: Party Animals Jigsaw
description: Party Animals Jigsaw is a game with funny images of party animals. This game allows you to play with 12 pictures with happy animals. Select the image you want to play and then select on how many pieces to split the image. Easy level is if you play with 25 pieces, medium level with 49 and hard if you play with 100 pieces. Drag the pieces and assemble the image from them. Choose the weight you want to play this game with and enjoy. There is no time limit while playing this game.
instructions: Use mouse to drag the pieces.

title: Love Balls Rescue
description: Pull the pins to help connect the two love balls in this fun online game. Avoid the traps and the nasty red ball as you try to join the two love balls. Bring together the blue and pink ball to complete each level.
instructions: Click or tap to pull the pins
